```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(stringr)
library(dplyr)
library(leaflet)
library(knitr)

# Load restaurant notes data
restaurants <- read_csv("restaurants.csv")

# Add a column for pop
map_data <- restaurants %>%
  mutate(name = str_c("<b>", name, "</b>"),
         text = str_c(name, notes, sep = "<br/>"))

```


The map below contains `r nrow(restaurants)` pins with restaurant reviews. 


```{r, echo=FALSE}

# Create restaurants map
leaflet(map_data) %>%
  addTiles() %>%  
  setView(-82.50, 28.0, zoom = 3) %>%
  addMarkers(lng = ~long, lat = ~lat, popup = ~text)

```

```{r, echo=FALSE}

restaurants %>%
  select(name, address) %>%
  arrange(name) %>%
  kable()

```
